text: Ara amara bani isara'ilake sagara para karalama [1]. Ara phira’a'una o tara sain'yabahini aud'dhatya sahakare simalanghana kare tadera pascad'dhabana karala. Parisese yakhana se dube yete lagala takhana balala, ‘ami imana analama ye, niscaya tini chara an'ya kono satya ilah ne'i, yara prati bani isara'ila imana eneche. Ara ami musalimadera antarbhukta
